080/**
081 * Provides different utilities methods to apply processing from a security perspective.<br>
082 * These code snippet:
083 * <ul>
084 *     <li>Can be used, as "foundation", to customize the validation to the app context.</li>
085 *     <li>Were implemented in a way to facilitate adding or removal of validations depending on usage context.</li>
086 *     <li>Were centralized on one class to be able to enhance them across time as well as <a href="https://github.com/righettod/code-snippets-security-utils/issues">missing case/bug identification</a>.</li>
087 * </ul>
088 * <br>
089 * <a href="https://github.com/righettod/code-snippets-security-utils">GitHub repository</a>.<br><br>
090 * <a href="https://github.com/righettod/code-snippets-security-utils/blob/main/src/main/java/eu/righettod/SecurityUtils.java">Source code of the class</a>.
091 */
092public class SecurityUtils {
093    /**
094     * Default constructor: Not needed as the class only provides static methods.
095     */
096    private SecurityUtils() {
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Apply a collection of validation to verify if a provided PIN code is considered weak (easy to guess) or none.<br>
101     * This method consider that format of the PIN code is [0-9]{6,}<br>
102     * Rule to consider a PIN code as weak:
103     * <ul>
104     * <li>Length is inferior to 6 positions.</li>
105     * <li>Contain only the same number or only a sequence of zero.</li>
106     * <li>Contain sequence of following incremental or decremental numbers.</li>
107     * </ul>
108     *
109     * @param pinCode PIN code to verify.
110     * @return True only if the PIN is considered as weak.
111     */
112    public static boolean isWeakPINCode(String pinCode) {
113        boolean isWeak = true;
114        //Length is inferior to 6 positions
115        //Use "Long.parseLong(pinCode)" to cause a NumberFormatException if the PIN is not a numeric one
116        //and to ensure that the PIN is not only a sequence of zero
117        if (pinCode != null && Long.parseLong(pinCode) > 0 && pinCode.trim().length() > 5) {
118            //Contain only the same number
119            String regex = String.format("^[%s]{%s}$", pinCode.charAt(0), pinCode.length());
120            if (!Pattern.matches(regex, pinCode)) {
121                //Contain sequence of following incremental or decremental numbers
122                char previousChar = 'X';
123                boolean containSequence = false;
124                for (char c : pinCode.toCharArray()) {
125                    if (previousChar != 'X') {
126                        int previousNbr = Integer.parseInt(String.valueOf(previousChar));
127                        int currentNbr = Integer.parseInt(String.valueOf(c));
128                        if (currentNbr == (previousNbr - 1) || currentNbr == (previousNbr + 1)) {
129                            containSequence = true;
130                            break;
131                        }
132                    }
133                    previousChar = c;
134                }
135                if (!containSequence) {
136                    isWeak = false;
137                }
138            }
139        }
140        return isWeak;
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Apply a collection of validations on a Word 97-2003 (binary format) document file provided:
145     * <ul>
146     * <li>Real Microsoft Word 97-2003 document file.</li>
147     * <li>No VBA Macro.<br></li>
148     * <li>No embedded objects.</li>
149     * </ul>
150     *
151     * @param wordFilePath Filename of the Word document file to check.
152     * @return True only if the file pass all validations.
153     * @see "https://poi.apache.org/components/"
154     * @see "https://poi.apache.org/components/document/"
155     * @see "https://poi.apache.org/components/poifs/how-to.html"
156     * @see "https://poi.apache.org/components/poifs/embeded.html"
157     * @see "https://poi.apache.org/"
158     * @see "https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.poi/poi"
159     */
160    public static boolean isWord972003DocumentSafe(String wordFilePath) {
161        boolean isSafe = false;
162        try {
163            File wordFile = new File(wordFilePath);
164            if (wordFile.exists() && wordFile.canRead() && wordFile.isFile()) {
165                //Step 1: Try to load the file, if its fail then it imply that is not a valid Word 97-2003 format file
166                try (POIFSFileSystem fs = new POIFSFileSystem(wordFile)) {
167                    //Step 2: Check if the document contains VBA macros, in our case is not allowed
168                    VBAMacroReader macroReader = new VBAMacroReader(fs);
169                    Map<String, String> macros = macroReader.readMacros();
170                    if (macros == null || macros.isEmpty()) {
171                        //Step 3: Check if the document contains any embedded objects, in our case is not allowed
172                        //From POI documentation:
173                        //Word normally stores embedded files in subdirectories of the ObjectPool directory, itself a subdirectory of the filesystem root.
174                        //Typically, these subdirectories and named starting with an underscore, followed by 10 numbers.
175                        final List<String> embeddedObjectFound = new ArrayList<>();
176                        DirectoryEntry root = fs.getRoot();
177                        if (root.getEntryCount() > 0) {
178                            root.iterator().forEachRemaining(entry -> {
179                                if ("ObjectPool".equalsIgnoreCase(entry.getName()) && entry instanceof DirectoryEntry) {
180                                    DirectoryEntry objPoolDirectory = (DirectoryEntry) entry;
181                                    if (objPoolDirectory.getEntryCount() > 0) {
182                                        objPoolDirectory.iterator().forEachRemaining(objPoolDirectoryEntry -> {
183                                            if (objPoolDirectoryEntry instanceof DirectoryEntry) {
184                                                DirectoryEntry objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntry = (DirectoryEntry) objPoolDirectoryEntry;
185                                                if (objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntry.getEntryCount() > 0) {
186                                                    objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntry.forEach(objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntryEntry -> {
187                                                        if (objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntryEntry.isDocumentEntry()) {
188                                                            embeddedObjectFound.add(objPoolDirectoryEntrySubDirectoryEntryEntry.getName());
189                                                        }
190                                                    });
191                                                }
192                                            }
193                                        });
194                                    }
195                                }
196                            });
197                        }
198                        isSafe = embeddedObjectFound.isEmpty();
199                    }
200                }
201            }
202        } catch (Exception e) {
203            isSafe = false;
204        }
205        return isSafe;
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * Ensure that an XML file does not contain any External Entity, DTD or XInclude instructions.
210     *
211     * @param xmlFilePath Filename of the XML file to check.
212     * @return True only if the file pass all validations.
213     * @see "https://portswigger.net/web-security/xxe"
214     * @see "https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/XML_External_Entity_Prevention_Cheat_Sheet.html#java"
215     * @see "https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/13/security/java-api-xml-processing-jaxp-security-guide.html#GUID-82F8C206-F2DF-4204-9544-F96155B1D258"
216     * @see "https://www.w3.org/TR/xinclude-11/"
217     * @see "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XInclude"
218     */
219    public static boolean isXMLSafe(String xmlFilePath) {
220        boolean isSafe = false;
221        try {
222            File xmlFile = new File(xmlFilePath);
223            if (xmlFile.exists() && xmlFile.canRead() && xmlFile.isFile()) {
224                //Step 1a: Verify that the XML file content does not contain any XInclude instructions
225                boolean containXInclude = Files.readAllLines(xmlFile.toPath()).stream().anyMatch(line -> line.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).contains(":include "));
226                if (!containXInclude) {
227                    //Step 1b: Parse the XML file, if an exception occur than it's imply that the XML specified is not a valid ones
228                    //Create an XML document builder throwing Exception if a DOCTYPE instruction is present
229                    DocumentBuilderFactory dbfInstance = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
230                    dbfInstance.setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/disallow-doctype-decl", true);
231                    //Xerces 2 only
232                    //dbfInstance.setFeature("http://xerces.apache.org/xerces2-j/features.html#disallow-doctype-decl",true);
233                    dbfInstance.setXIncludeAware(false);
234                    DocumentBuilder builder = dbfInstance.newDocumentBuilder();
235                    //Parse the document
236                    Document doc = builder.parse(xmlFile);
237                    isSafe = (doc != null && doc.getDocumentElement() != null);
238                }
239            }
240        } catch (Exception e) {
241            isSafe = false;
242        }
243        return isSafe;
244    }
245
246
247    /**
248     * Extract all URL links from a PDF file provided.<br>
249     * This can be used to apply validation on a PDF against contained links.
250     *
251     * @param pdfFilePath pdfFilePath Filename of the PDF file to process.
252     * @return A List of URL objects that is empty if no links is found.
253     * @throws Exception If any error occurs during the processing of the PDF file.
254     * @see "https://www.gushiciku.cn/pl/21KQ"
255     * @see "https://pdfbox.apache.org/"
256     * @see "https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.pdfbox/pdfbox"
257     */
258    public static List<URL> extractAllPDFLinks(String pdfFilePath) throws Exception {
259        final List<URL> links = new ArrayList<>();
260        File pdfFile = new File(pdfFilePath);
261        try (PDDocument document = Loader.loadPDF(pdfFile)) {
262            PDDocumentCatalog documentCatalog = document.getDocumentCatalog();
263            AnnotationFilter actionURIAnnotationFilter = new AnnotationFilter() {
264                @Override
265                public boolean accept(PDAnnotation annotation) {
266                    boolean keep = false;
267                    if (annotation instanceof PDAnnotationLink) {
268                        keep = (((PDAnnotationLink) annotation).getAction() instanceof PDActionURI);
269                    }
270                    return keep;
271                }
272            };
273            documentCatalog.getPages().forEach(page -> {
274                try {
275                    page.getAnnotations(actionURIAnnotationFilter).forEach(annotation -> {
276                        PDActionURI linkAnnotation = (PDActionURI) ((PDAnnotationLink) annotation).getAction();
277                        try {
278                            URL urlObj = new URL(linkAnnotation.getURI());
279                            if (!links.contains(urlObj)) {
280                                links.add(urlObj);
281                            }
282                        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
283                            throw new RuntimeException(e);
284                        }
285                    });
286                } catch (Exception e) {
287                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
288                }
289            });
290        }
291        return links;
292    }
293
294    /**
295     * Apply a collection of validations on a PDF file provided:
296     * <ul>
297     * <li>Real PDF file.</li>
298     * <li>No attachments.</li>
299     * <li>No Javascript code.</li>
300     * <li>No links using action of type URI/Launch/RemoteGoTo/ImportData.</li>
301     * <li>No XFA forms in order to prevent exposure to XXE/SSRF like CVE-2025-54988.</li>
302     * </ul>
303     *
304     * @param pdfFilePath Filename of the PDF file to check.
305     * @return True only if the file pass all validations.
306     * @see "https://stackoverflow.com/a/36161267"
307     * @see "https://www.gushiciku.cn/pl/21KQ"
308     * @see "https://github.com/jonaslejon/malicious-pdf"
309     * @see "https://pdfbox.apache.org/"
310     * @see "https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.pdfbox/pdfbox"
311     * @see "https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-54988"
312     * @see "https://github.com/mgthuramoemyint/POC-CVE-2025-54988"
313     * @see "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XFA"
314     */
315    public static boolean isPDFSafe(String pdfFilePath) {
316        boolean isSafe = false;
317        try {
318            File pdfFile = new File(pdfFilePath);
319            if (pdfFile.exists() && pdfFile.canRead() && pdfFile.isFile()) {
320                //Step 1: Try to load the file, if its fail then it imply that is not a valid PDF file
321                try (PDDocument document = Loader.loadPDF(pdfFile)) {
322                    //Step 2: Check if the file contains attached files, in our case is not allowed
323                    PDDocumentCatalog documentCatalog = document.getDocumentCatalog();
324                    PDDocumentNameDictionary namesDictionary = new PDDocumentNameDictionary(documentCatalog);
325                    if (namesDictionary.getEmbeddedFiles() == null) {
326                        //Step 3: Check if the file contains any XFA forms
327                        PDAcroForm acroForm = documentCatalog.getAcroForm();
328                        boolean hasForm = (acroForm != null && acroForm.getXFA() != null);
329                        if (!hasForm) {
330                            //Step 4: Check if the file contains Javascript code, in our case is not allowed
331                            if (namesDictionary.getJavaScript() == null) {
332                                //Step 5: Check if the file contains links using action of type URI/Launch/RemoteGoTo/ImportData, in our case is not allowed
333                                final List<Integer> notAllowedAnnotationCounterList = new ArrayList<>();
334                                AnnotationFilter notAllowedAnnotationFilter = new AnnotationFilter() {
335                                    @Override
336                                    public boolean accept(PDAnnotation annotation) {
337                                        boolean keep = false;
338                                        if (annotation instanceof PDAnnotationLink) {
339                                            PDAnnotationLink link = (PDAnnotationLink) annotation;
340                                            PDAction action = link.getAction();
341                                            if ((action instanceof PDActionURI) || (action instanceof PDActionLaunch) || (action instanceof PDActionRemoteGoTo) || (action instanceof PDActionImportData)) {
342                                                keep = true;
343                                            }
344                                        }
345                                        return keep;
346                                    }
347                                };
348                                documentCatalog.getPages().forEach(page -> {
349                                    try {
350                                        notAllowedAnnotationCounterList.add(page.getAnnotations(notAllowedAnnotationFilter).size());
351                                    } catch (IOException e) {
352                                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
353                                    }
354                                });
355                                if (notAllowedAnnotationCounterList.stream().reduce(0, Integer::sum) == 0) {
356                                    isSafe = true;
357                                }
358                            }
359                        }
360                    }
361                }
362            }
363        } catch (Exception e) {
364            isSafe = false;
365        }
366        return isSafe;
367    }
368
369    /**
370     * Remove as much as possible metadata from the provided PDF document object.
371     *
372     * @param document PDFBox PDF document object on which metadata must be removed.
373     * @see "https://gist.github.com/righettod/d7e07443c43d393a39de741a0d920069"
374     * @see "https://pdfbox.apache.org/"
375     * @see "https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.pdfbox/pdfbox"
376     */
377    public static void clearPDFMetadata(PDDocument document) {
378        if (document != null) {
379            PDDocumentInformation infoEmpty = new PDDocumentInformation();
380            document.setDocumentInformation(infoEmpty);
381            PDMetadata newMetadataEmpty = new PDMetadata(document);
382            document.getDocumentCatalog().setMetadata(newMetadataEmpty);
383        }
384    }
